website_summaries.verdict: This budget-friendly electric sterilizer gets the job done without a sky-high price tag. Just be sure to follow cleaning and descaling instructions to keep it in good order.
pros: Steam sterilizes baby products in 6 minutes
Kills up to 99.9 percent of bacteria
Sterilizes up to 9 bottles and accessories in a single load
No accidental opening, thanks to upward-locking tabs
cons: Bottom plate may start rusting sooner than expected
If this happens, try descaling it with vinegar

customer_reviews.title: Sterilizer works pretty well, but its a huge fire hazard as ...
customer_reviews.text: Sterilizer works pretty well, but its a huge fire hazard as it turns in by its self. I had left it plugged in because it isn't supposed to start until you hit the button. But I was at home and hadn't used itin over 12 hours and it came in by itself (no water in it). Thankfully I was home and heard it (it was loud enough my dog was barking at it) and unplugged it. Will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great Sterilizer
customer_reviews.text: This works great. We bought this not knowing how much we'd use it since my wife breastfeeds our baby. However we had to supplement him when he was first born and also use it to sterilize the breast pump parts. Works great and would highly recommend to anyone looking for a sterilizer.
customer_reviews.author: John Beystehner

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well at first, I am the mom of newborn twins so the sterilizer is a must. We did start seeing the rust ring start last week but descaling it with some vinegar added to the water left it sparkling again. Today it just stopped working all together. We've only used this thing for five weeks. I was expecting it to last a lot longer. Plus we didn't like that there is only a one touch setting which means no off button.
customer_reviews.author: Lor

customer_reviews.title: Great electric sterilizer for twins
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and I think its not too big for the kitchen counter. I can put inside more than 9 bottles (Dr. Brown's 4oz. & Medela 5oz.) plus the extra accesories. I clean it once a week with water and vinager and it works perfectly I just have wash it after with water and rub paper towel (or you can just leave to dry alone). I really reccommend this product specially for mothers of multiples. I'm using this in Panama (110V). I would say that the only con is that the steam exit can burn your skin (common sense) and be careful, don't direct it towards the kitchen furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Taylin

customer_reviews.title: No overheat protection??
customer_reviews.text: Our unit was fried after 3 months. We woke up one morning and it smells burning rubber in the kitchen. It took us a long while to realize it's the steamer. The bottom of the unit is melted by heat. We may have accidentally turn this on with no water in it. Regardless how this has happened, it's very dangerous as the steamer doesn't seem to have any overheat protection built into it. Thankfully it didn't cause a fire...
customer_reviews.author: Mr Pi Huang

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE!!!! UNSAFE FOR ANY CHILD!!!
customer_reviews.text: After a of month of use, a brown tarnish appeared on the heat plate that would not come off after a good scrubbing. No big deal till 2 months of use... the heat plate turned completely brown/black and the particulate would flake off and is on the shelving which means it's on the bottles!!! This is SO unsafe for any infant. What was my daughter digesting? And yes I routinely cleaned the sterilizer and used filtered water in the pourer provided.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best baby gift ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in preparation of my 2nd baby's birth. It's by far the best gift I could have given myself! I hated boiling bottles with my first baby to sanitize them. I wish I would have been smart enough to get this or register for this awesome invention. I do like it better than the bottle sanitizer you put in the microwave. I don't recommend leaving the bottles in it after sanitizing because they don't dry. And I also recommend washing the sterilizer a couple of times a week. This is an awesome gift for anyone! I use it every day at least 3 times!
customer_reviews.author: linda vasquez

customer_reviews.title: I have gotten great use out of this
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten great use out of this! Can't believe I previously purchased a different brand for $75! This one was almost 1/3 the cost and works great!!!!! Nothing melts like other posts mentioned when you use the tray it comes with as nothing but water should be touching the heating element. This is a must have for sterilizing bottles. You could convert it to a small trashcan later or pass on to someone that has babies using bottles.
customer_reviews.author: kalena

customer_reviews.title: Bottles will not dry after using this.
customer_reviews.text: Your bottles will never dry. Pretty much eliminates the whole point of sterilizing. After I hand boil them and place them on the rack, they dry without issue. After using this sanitizer and placing them on the rack, they do.not.dry. The condensation stays even after 12 hours in a warm, dry room on an open air rack. They do not dry in or out of the sanitizer. I tried it 4 times and sent it back. Get yourself a WABI or just boil everything in a large pot.
customer_reviews.author: Katterin

customer_reviews.title: Prefer boiling bottles over steaming them after using this.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe steaming the bottles wasn't for my husband and I. We prefer the boiling bottles method. I guess if you want to steam your bottles this would be an option. But the extra cleaning of the machine and sometimes the bottles and pacifiers had a funny smell even after cleaning so my experience wasnt great, but maybe it might be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sterilizing on vacation!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be able to sterilize bottles for my infant on our recent trip to Disney World since there was not a microwave available in the resort room we stayed in to use with my microwave sterilizer. I wish I had this sterilizer all along because it works fast (6 minutes) and holds way more bottles than my Avent microwave sterilizer. Very affordable and worked very well!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Evans

customer_reviews.title: 1 star
customer_reviews.text: It stops working after 2 mos! Sad I cant return it anymore for free. I tried to send it back to its manufacturer in CA but Shipping is more costly than the product price. It's just a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Myah

customer_reviews.title: High capacity
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sterilizer with high capacity and this exceeded my expectations! It’s so easy to work with and you can fit so much stuff in it! I’m in love with my sterilizer and Munchkin products. This is honestly one of the best products you can buy and it’s so much cheaper than a lot of the other sterilizers (I almost bought the $60 Dr.Browns one) highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Best steriliser with great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Fits all kinds of bottles and a lot of stuff in one go. Great value and gets the job done. Easy to clean and maintain. I can put a lot of different size bottles and breast pump stuff at one time and this does the job in one go. Saves time . I highly recommend to new parents.
customer_reviews.author: Aarwen

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I love this I have a lot of lung issues so I have to sterilizer my nebulizer tubing and Nebcup I have to take 2-3 teatments a day so I would have to boil water to clean it every time so it took a lot of time this saves me so many hours so I totally recommend
customer_reviews.author: desgram

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Quiet Sterilizer
customer_reviews.text: First time using it. It's absolutely quiet. I expected it to be noisy and it's not. I love how easy it is to use. My daughter paid over a hundred dollars for her sterilizer. I paid just twenty six. I got an amazing sterilizer and yes, for the best price.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: My son is a little over 2 months and I have used this once a day since he was born. Today it is already not working. Every time I press the button to turn it on it will either not turn on or or it will light up turn on for a minute then turn off again....
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and was sterilizing my sons bottles before he comes and as soon as I removed the stand where are the bottles are kept from the container, I saw the middle stick was warped on my first use! I had to bend it back to being straight, but it was still warped to one side. The second time I used it, the bottom plate got warped upwards to one side. I'm going to contact munchkin! Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Curry

customer_reviews.title: This sanitizer works great! I used it every single day and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This sanitizer works great ! I used it every single day and it lasted me months, I do recommend to wash it throughly with soapy warm water since some "milk" does get stuck on the bottom from all the steaming.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Plastic melts at the bottom
customer_reviews.text: I liked the item until 6 months after the purchase, the plastic at the bottom seems to have melted and I am not sure whether it is safe to use or not. Update: I contacted the customer service and they offered to send me a replacement. The whole process is very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Had this for 3 years, 3 children later.
customer_reviews.text: Still going strong, no rust at all (I purchased mine in June 2015 and it is Feb 2018). FITS A TON of crap to simply state it. Mine takes less than 4 minutes to sterilize 4-5 bottles nightly.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: excellent gift
customer_reviews.text: excellent gift for a couple waiting for a newborn, this bottle sterilizer is very easy to use, you just follow the instructions and you're done
customer_reviews.author: Amin EspinosaTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the sterilizer itself! It was better than what I use to have 4 almost 5 years go. I had purchased this for my breast pump and bottles that I was using. I noticed that then my bottles were not screwing on right and they weren't just no cheap bottles. They were the playtex ventiaire bottles. I found out that this was just to hot of a temp for the bottles. Luckily I can get them replaced from the manufacture. But other than that it's great! I would recommend it still to anyone that needs a good one for lots of parts and nic nacs!
customer_reviews.author: Joelle V

customer_reviews.title: LIFESAVER
customer_reviews.text: This is such a lifesaver. I may sound spoiled but being able to sanitize these in a non microwavable container is a great feeling. I just love how I can fit bottles, nipples, pacifiers, and bottle tops in here. The only thing that I wish it had was a dry setting on it because drying the bottles take forever when your baby is eating every 2-3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jacklynn

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it, you won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: I had an old one, same model and it finally died. It lived a good life, loved it enough to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Bottled Convenience
customer_reviews.text: With minor putting together of the bottle rack this is pretty much Ready to use right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: La-Donna R.

customer_reviews.title: I used it for just 20 days(1time a day), ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it for just 20 days(1time a day), but it was rusted out, unable to fix. It's not for baby. Do not buy this machine if you want to keep your baby's health.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i love it it worked as described
customer_reviews.text: i love it it worked as described. very easy to use and clean. and very fast! it doesn't take too long to sterilize the bottles and when its done it switch off on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima K.

customer_reviews.title: Received repackaged item
customer_reviews.text: When we received item it looked like the box it was in had been opened and repackaged. Sterilizer box was also damaged. Definitely sending this back.
customer_reviews.author: MADDen Mama

customer_reviews.title: Item came used. Box was damaged, new safety ...
customer_reviews.text: Item came used. Box was damaged, new safety seals had been put on top of the original seals, the box was open and cord was unwravelled. Returning today. Not ideal to receive a used baby product.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Sterilizer
customer_reviews.text: Easily fits 8 Dr Brown bottles with all parts. Nice neutral design so it looks good in my kitchen. Easy to clean and only 6 minutes from start to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Works but is unnecessary
customer_reviews.text: First one we received was broken. Handle was cracked and steam would not work b/c of latch safely mechanism. Contacted amazon and it was replaced quickly. Works fine, but anything you put in there will take a very, very long time to dry once removed. I really don't think we needed this, we could have just boiled our things and been fine. Have only used it maybe 5 times in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Its a good product a bit huge but holds all the bottles ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a good product a bit huge but holds all the bottles i need. However 4 days after using it though i realized that the metalic part started to change colour (brownish) get rusty.
customer_reviews.author: Shanique

customer_reviews.title: After the third use this product created a horrible burnt plastic smell on all of my bottles
customer_reviews.text: After the third use this product created a horrible burnt plastic smell on all of my bottles. I had to re-wash everything and did not want to risk using it again out of fear that it isn't properly sterilizing. I'm in the process of returning.
customer_reviews.author: MissyF

customer_reviews.title: stop working after view month, but its good item
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. My sister used for over 3 years. However, it stop working and had to buy a new one. I hope this one last longer. It very storage and easy easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: katherinne tamayo

customer_reviews.title: If you boil bottles, you need this.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life saver. Never boil another bottle again. Perfectly steamed bottle and bottle parts in about 6 minutes. Makes life a breeze
customer_reviews.author: Joshua G

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Cheap, Cheap .
customer_reviews.text: This is the cheapest made bottle sterilized I've ever came across. Not only was it clearly cheaply made, it didn't even work! Get the Avent one. It's only a few dollars more and its SO much better.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use sterilizer
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to use. You put the water in the bottom, put your rinsed bottles and whatnot into it, close it, and turn it on. It fits just the right amount of things in it and makes things a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: Virginiaveg

customer_reviews.title: Currently looking for a better product.
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working only after 4 months of having it. Definitely would not purchase again. Currently looking for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: EJ M

customer_reviews.title: Rusty after less than one week
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and used for less than a week and the metal plate in the bottom has already rusted. It makes the bottles, etc dirty with brown residue. I followed the directions that it came with! I loved it and thought it worked great until rusty water residue started. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney D.

customer_reviews.title: This is so easy. 100% better than trying to boil or microwave ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy. 100% better than trying to boil or microwave to sanitize. Nothing to have to assemble. Push a button and in 6 minutes everything is done. So simple. Way worth the few dollars to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christison

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I love it, easy to clean and do great work work sterilizing i used twice daily and i also put the pacifier and the teether but its stop working after 5 month I will order it again
customer_reviews.author: Lana A.K

customer_reviews.title: I have used other sterilizers and this one is great. Has a large capacity for up to 9 ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used other sterilizers and this one is great. Has a large capacity for up to 9 Dr. Brown's bottles. Only downfall is the moisturizer from the sterilization process. Bottles take a full day or more to dry. I've had the same problem with other sterilizers as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wife

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this product because after using it the bottles gives a very strong plastic burn smell and baby hates that. The products looks really good material wise but did not work for me. If you or your baby does not mind the plastic smell then go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Faizan Mazhar

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is really spacious and can hold enough items to sterilize. It's really fast! Good quality! Easy to use!! Wish I had bought this when I had my first son!!
customer_reviews.author: kerry

customer_reviews.title: Great price great product
customer_reviews.text: The only dislike is no matter how many times I clean and sterilize the product little pieces of idk what always surface brown little chips . Other then that month 4 still use everyday for my baby
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: Love it fits alot of bottles up to 8 oz
customer_reviews.text: In 6 min i am able to clean and sanitize 6 DR. Bottles
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with this product ... I bought it based on the reviews bottom rack is completely un usable after using it couple of times because of the brown rust like thing
customer_reviews.author: Sirisha K.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Used it several times so far. Quick and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: justine

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Second time I buy this. I had it almost 4 years ago and got it now for my second child. It is easy to use and to clean. I love that it allows you to sterilize several items at a time. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: EAPTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile to use with different bottles/nipples/pacifiers etc. and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cheal

customer_reviews.title: Love it for price i paid
customer_reviews.text: Love this bottle steamer! Great price for product. Do read instructions carefully. You get that burnt smell when you pour the water and it splashed to the side walls of the steamer. Make sure the water is poured directly in the middle metal ring and also use proper measurements of water, this should help alleviate burnt smell. There is residue built up if you do not clean it properly. I usually just take a paper towel and clean it. I'm sure there are more better ways to clean it, but works for me. It doess collect residue which i was able to clean at first but now I can't get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Dkhill

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a new mom
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a must have when you have a baby. It was great, easy to use and real quick. It's been almost 2yrs and is still kicking!
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and plenty of space. Larger than other electric steamers and for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi P

customer_reviews.title: Nice sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: I like the product works great. A little concerning of the metal center is turning born.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this item for any moms with bottle feeding babies
customer_reviews.text: This helps me so much. Way easier than boiling water and soaking the bottles. Although it does take longer than 6 minutes but that's not to big of a problem and the evenflo curved 6 oz bottles don't really stand up well but again not a problem if you just take the time to steadily set them up and put the holder in the sterilizer. Definitely recommend this item for any moms with bottle feeding babies.
customer_reviews.author: Taz

customer_reviews.title: NOT SO HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: SADLY I DID NOT GET TO ENJOY THIS SINCE IT STOPPED WORKING ON THE 1ST DAY AND GETTING SPARES TO FIX IT IN MY COUNTRY IS QUITE DIFFICULT. FELT LIKE I WASTED MY MONEY ON THIS PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: damaris

customer_reviews.title: Effective at what it does
customer_reviews.text: This unit is effective at what it does. You get what you pay for here. It's of medium size with cheaper materials. So don't expect high grade. That said, I pack this thing up as much as possible and it gets our bottles and oral syringes sterilized well. It has lasted about 6 months now and it's still going. It's pretty inexpensive and well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: It's simple to use, easy to clean and at a great price. I can fit all kinds of different brand bottles in there without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: One of the must have for new moms. My sister and my cousin had one and recommended me this brand because of how easy is to use! Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Marlen J.

customer_reviews.title: It cleans easily and we did not have to descale it very ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a travel sterilizer for work. It is very roomy and can hold a lot of bottles and pump parts. It cleans easily and we did not have to descale it very frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Amber B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This has made my life so much easier. We were washing and then boiling bottles everyday! It's very annoying and time consuming when you have a newborn that needs your every second. Reasonable price too. I have had it for about 5 months and no problem at all
customer_reviews.author: karla lopez

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Update after 6 months of using it, it died :( I have been cleaning it once a week as mentioned, with vinegar & water, & yet it stopped working after 6 months, & we couldn't return it anymore nor exchange it, such a waste of money 😕 This was a lot bigger than I expected, so it's taking up a lot of space in our kitchen side table, but it's doing it's job of sterilizing my baby's bottles and my pump bottles and parts. I have been cleaning it every week as advised, but the iron plate is still kinda dirty, I just hope this will last at least 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: Inna Furlong

customer_reviews.title: Leaves milk film
customer_reviews.text: I rinse everything in steaming hot water before placing in the steamer. But still there is milk residue on the bottles and nipples. But it really does save time in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice sterilizer... however space is limited and the hot plate in the middle rusts after a while
customer_reviews.author: Elisabet Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Works very well everything is so clean
customer_reviews.text: Love it just put a little water in it turn it on and your done
customer_reviews.author: Liz Conley

customer_reviews.title: Probably wouldn't buy it if I had to do it again
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine although bottles came out feeling slimy and looking spotty from the water. After trying it for a month we decided to shelf if and sterilize the old fashion way. I may try to cook dumplings in it someday I think.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian2014

customer_reviews.title: I like to occasional sterilize all my bottles
customer_reviews.text: I like to occasional sterilize all my bottles, nipples, etc. This is great for bigger jobs. Quick, easy and handy.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiana

customer_reviews.title: I put it all together and somehow burned my finger really bad. Packaged it back up and returned it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to sanitize my daughters bottles. I put it all together and somehow burned my finger really bad . Packaged it back up and returned it. Also really big for the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Blank Sweet Love

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Happy i chose this sterilizer, it works great not disappointed at all. *Tip if you have other small kids in the house be sure to put this oh a high counter or flat surface where they won't be able to touch it as it gets extremely hot.
customer_reviews.author: IslandMommy

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: This was working quite fine (regardless of the rust) then it stopped working al of a sudden today. A big waste of money. Now I’m going to have to research and buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Avian Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Super fast
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Super fast. I actually bought this to clean nebulizer parts. This is way easier than boiling them! I just wish the tongs were a little longer. Note: It is big. So you will need a lot of space in your cabinet to store it.
customer_reviews.author: lynne

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, fast, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me. I use it once a week, sterilize all the bottles and parts. Good product for the money
customer_reviews.author: MaiaR

customer_reviews.title: best part is that there is no need to microwave ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, best part is that there is no need to microwave anything as with some other sterilizers. Anything with radiation is probably not a good idea when it comes to your baby.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen K. Balram

customer_reviews.title: This is also a gift
customer_reviews.text: The receiver of this gift loved the item and uses it on a daily basis. It is easy and convenient to use and comes in so handy. It is small enough to fit on the counter so it is not in the way. One of the best and most practical gift she received. She would recommend it to every mother. It makes life easier for mother who nurses as well as those who don't.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. So quick and easy to Sterilize pump parts and bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a baby shower
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for our close friends, they love it, last time I checked it was working perfectly
customer_reviews.author: L.Duane

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient and quick. Cleans the bottles good. Only downside is that they are still really wet when it's done but otherwise it works really well
customer_reviews.author: Tiphani bobonik

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Works like charm. Worth the money. At at time I can easily sterilize 5 bottles
customer_reviews.author: Shrey

customer_reviews.title: Great! Simple and sweet and does not take much ...
customer_reviews.text: Great ! Simple and sweet and does not take much space.
customer_reviews.author: CAY

customer_reviews.title: Heater burns tray
customer_reviews.text: Product was working great until I noticed the heat plate on the bottom was burning the plastic tray holder and making the bottles stink. This is a very poor design
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Great for travelling
customer_reviews.text: This works awesome and is so easy and fast. We got it for when we travel and don't have access to a dishwasher or microwave and it did the trick. It is quite a large appliance though. I guess it has to be to fit the 8 oz bottles.
customer_reviews.author: PositivelyMommy

customer_reviews.title: great sterilizer!
customer_reviews.text: Received as a gift, great sterilizer!!! Easy yo use and the adjustable tray is great
customer_reviews.author: Alaq11

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in September and now just 4 months later it doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy V.

customer_reviews.title: Short term use!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last more than 3 months and I was very good at maintaining/cleaning it :/
customer_reviews.author: wattana poboonrueng

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this for several weeks and so far am pleased with the product. It is easy to use and works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Danny and Kim

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of garbage. I used it 4 times and it worked fine after the 5th.....burnt plastic smell. The bottles all smell of burnt plastic & it is disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Tallison1041

customer_reviews.title: Good Results So Far
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily for several months now with no problems and I really like the large capacity. I have never had rust, melting or unit automatically turning on, and oops, I didn't read the directions and haven't even cleaned it yet with vinegar. I do get spots on my silicone Comotomo nipples here and there but I think that is when I use tap water which has chlorine and minerals. I usually don't get it when using purified water. I do unload it fairly quickly after use and leave it open to dry, though, and put bottles and nipples on a Munchkin drying rack. Maybe that makes a difference? So far so good with it - knock on wood.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It is so nice to put all my bottles and nipples in this in the a.m. and then in 6 mins it is done! Do be careful of the steam vent on the back, it is hot if put your hand there! This is great and I highly recommend this!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: I like ours, its big enough to fit multiple bottles ...
customer_reviews.text: If you clean this weekly as the instructions tell you to do, then you have no problems with rust. I like ours, its big enough to fit multiple bottles in and it is quick. I have used this every day sometimes twice, three times a day for six months and it is still going strong.

customer_reviews.title: We have a newborn and were spending a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a newborn and were spending a lot of time sterilizing the feeding bottles. This product is able to sterilize multiple bottles within a short time. The only negative I have to say is that there is a slight discoloration at the bottom of the steamer. It does not affect the performance of the machine.

customer_reviews.text: We’ve only used this sterilizer for a month and the bottom is already rusted and turns the water brown that cleans the bottles. They also have a funky smell once we get them out. Don’t waste your money!

product_meta.title: Munchkin Steam Guard Electric Sterilizer
product_meta.description:
Help protect your baby from harmful bacteria with Munchkin's Steam Guard Electric Sterilizer. The large capacity sterilizer can sterilize up to 9 bottles and accessories at a time. The fast, easy-to-use system starts the cleaning cycle with the push of one button and automatically shuts off when sterilization is complete. The heat resistant handle and tongs help prevent steam burns. A one-way latch helps remind you to open the lid away from the body and the tabs lock upward to prevent accidental opening.

BRAND STORY
By Munchkin
feature_bullets: Large capacity, sterilizes up to 9 bottles and accessories at a time
Easy to use, start cleaning cycle with one button

Sterilizes in only 6 minutes, The Steam Guard Electric Sterilizer by Munchkin is a safe, natural and efficient way to kill up 99.9% of bacteria on bottles, nipples, pacifiers, teethers, small toys and breast pump accessories.
Automatic shut-off when sterilization is complete
Protects your baby from harmful bacteria without harsh chemicals
Tabs lock upward to prevent accidental opening
